Articles.Content:
Hello there, craft downloader, have you ever wanted an LESS that can get 2 kerbonauts off the moon safely while being compact? Well look no further, as I have an LESS from back in ye olden days of Apollo development! And it's remotely controlled!

Warning: May not lift off, as it has NOT been fully tested yet!

Features:

RCS powered

Capacity of 2 kerbonauts

Compact

Disadvantages:

Clamp-o-Tron Jr. only for docking

Metal

Not a lot of RCS (Sub-orbital Rendevouz recommended)

Avionics package.

Download: http://www./download/yrack6msfdtqf3o/LESS.craft

Pics:

And:

And:

Feedback is always appreciated!

Also, if this doesn't lift off on Kerbin, it might on the Mun!

Edit: It was DESIGNED for the Mun

The reason I made this is because I couldn't find any others on the forums.

-Agent30632

Update: Tested on the Mun, WORKS, New link is one with Avionics for holding heading.

Edited May 20, 2013 by Agent30632
''May not lift off'', are you kidding me?

''May not lift off'', are you kidding me?

Um, it says "It was DESIGNED for the Mun"

So it's mainly for the Mun.

Seems just Kerbal enough to work.

I like it... put it into mass production immediately!

Edited May 20, 2013 by AnalogAddict
I like it... put it into mass production immediately!
